page.title: 15School Life
page.content: At our school subjects such as English, Maths, French, Science, History, Music, Geography, Computers, Craft/Design and Technology, Religious Education, Home Economics, Art/Craft, Games, Swimming and Physical Education are taught. The school is divided into 8 classes, 2 for each year covering the 9-13 age range. 1st and 2nd years are taught in mixed ability groups as individual classes but 3rd and 4th are set for most lessons. Lunchtime activities of music, choir, football, netball, cricket, badminton and gymnastics are held plus computer, chess and engineering clubs. The 4th years are sometimes given priviliges such as entering the school building in the morning and discos at lunchtime. The school has 3 computers, video television, radio cassettes and a video camera.
